title: Duncan Nichols Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Duncan Nichols? Check out all of Duncan Nichols's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogDuncan Nichols Director of Strategy & Planning, Croud Duncan Nichols Duncan has worked in digital for nine years, with most of that time spent agency-side (though he started his career selling theatre tickets online for Time Out). His background spans all aspects of digital marketing, and after working in biddable media at Mindshare, he left in 2017 to join global digital agency Croud, where he’s now their Director of Strategy & Planning. Show more Research Intelligence Tapping Into New Markets Using Market And Competitor Insights Digital Analysis by Duncan Nichols 4 Min.
